transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Customer: Ha sir, kya issue aa raha hai?

Customer: Kya issue kya aa raha hai?

Customer: Aapko share, aapko maine jo share kiya woh do ghante pehle ki hai, teen ghante se pehle se already mention hai, phir bhi aap bol rahe ho ki yeh purani ho gayi hai, nayi kuch bhejiye.

Customer: Yeh do ghante, teen ghante se purana hota hai?

Customer: Pata nahi.

Customer: Kya keh rahe hai aap?
Customer: Mujhe toh pata nahi, aap kahenge waise manna hi padega.
Customer: Sir proper mention hai, please dekhiye toh pehle ki kaunsi humne bheji hai, kya aap usse dekh rahe ho, search karke dekh rahe ho, bhi rahe ho ya nahi. Main aapko continuously ek toh WhatsApp pe share kar rahi hu, hamari services nahi hai WhatsApp pe share karne ke liye.
Customer: Aapke paas mein app diya gaya hai.
Customer: Aapke paas mein app diya gaya hai, aap uss app se khud search karke nikaliye, main aapko kitni baar guide kar chuki hu.
Customer: Na na, mat bheja karo phir.
Customer: Sir bheja karo ek toh main bhej rahi hu upar se aap baar baar 96 pe call kar lete ho, aap jab baar baar 96 pe call karoge aapki listing kharab ho jayegi, mere se mat boliyega phir.
Customer: Aap report likh kara do mere khilaaf, yeh baar baar call kar raha hai, yeh hamara kaam nahi hai.
Customer: Kya keh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Aap nahi samajh rahe ho, aapki report likha do mere khilaaf.
Customer: Are toh sir baar baar call karna hi kyun hai, aapko main bhej rahi hu aap usko use karo, main bata rahi hu, samjha rahi hu toh aap uss cheez ko samjhiye toh.
Customer: Sir hamara kaam WhatsApp pe share karne ka nahi hai.
Customer: Kyun kar rahe ho phir, yahi toh main puch raha hu.
Customer: Ha, thik hai sir, mera kaam WhatsApp pe share karne ka nahi hai pehle toh, aapko main samjha rahi hu, guide kar rahi hu, aap apne app se lead dekhiye na waha pe, maine aapko two hours pehle ki dekhi, aapne woh dekha nahi ki two hour pehle ki hai ki nahi, aapne seedhe likh diya purani hai.
Customer: Toh sir jab tak use nahi karenge aap kaise services ka le lenge, bataiye?
Customer: Nahi toh mujhe pehle toh yeh uda do WhatsApp pe bhi mera.
Customer: Aap har lead pe yahi cheez bolte ho ki hamara abhi isme conversion nahi nikal ke aa raha hai.
Customer: Aap bhi toh keh rahe ho mera kaam nahi hai toh uda do, kyun bhej rahe ho WhatsApp pe?
Customer: Ha sir WhatsApp pe hum nahi share kar payenge, aap apna app open kariye, waha pe buylead section pe jaake khud hi check kariye.
Customer: Waha kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Aap video meet pe aa jaiye, main aapko dikh samjha deti hu dobara se ki kaise use karna hai.
Customer: Mere paas time paas nahi hai mere paas. Aur barbaad ho chuka hu main. Aur tumne mere kharab kar diye. Aur ab tum gayi ho mere ko time nahi hai mere paas.
Customer: Ha toh sir time na baar baar complain karne se ya baar baar kisi ko phone karne se nahi hoti hai, proper baith ke dekhna padega aapko, follow up karna padega apne clients, tab jaake aap lead convert kar payenge, hamara kaam lead convert karke dena nahi hai.
Customer: Lead hi nahi hai madam, kya follow karo.
Customer: Faltu woh Gaurav ji bol rahe hai hum bhejenge woh karenge, khud bol rahe ho, khud palat rahe ho din mein char baar.
Customer: Toh de rahi hu na sir uss din se.
Customer: Ha sir hum, aap kisi se bhi baat kar lijiyega agar aapka koi friend aur colleague ho agar relative se toh ki WhatsApp pe share karte hai ya app mein share karte hai lead ko.
Customer: Kyun kar rahe ho toh, main yahi toh keh raha hu mat bhejo.
Customer: Kyunki aapko problem aa rahi thi, aapne bola tha ki humko samajh mein nahi aa raha hai, tab maine aapko share karna start kiya tha.
Customer: Problem hamare liye aayi hui hai, ro raha hu main toh, koi sunta toh hai nahi.
Customer: Sir dera bhi problem pe aap 96 pe call kar doge toh usse resolution bhi thodi na mil jayega.
Customer: Toh kaise milega, mar jau phir?
Customer: Kyunki sir aap use nahi kar rahe ho usko, app open kariye na sir, main aapko itni baar bata rahi hu aap uss cheez ko samajhne ki koshish kariye, aap bas bolte rehte ho, bolte rehte ho.
Customer: Batao kya bolte rehta hu, batao.
Customer: Aapke matlab taraf se kuch hai hi nahi, ulta mere ko bol rahe ho, kyun bhej rahe ho yeh band kar do main toh keh raha hu.
Customer: Farzi company hai.
Customer: Woh sir agar baar baar aise hi karenge toh woh automatically band ho jayegi, aapko kehne ki zarurat hi nahi padegi.
Customer: Ha toh badhiya hai, dhanyavaad IndiaMART ko.
Customer: Aap apna app open kariye, main aapko batati hu kaise karna hai.
Customer: App mein kuch hai hi nahi, aaj ki lead hai isme, nahi aayegi toh?
Customer: Kyun nahi hai sir, aap open kariye na buylead dekhiye, meri side se itni sari buylead hai, aapko kaise nahi dikh sakta hai.
Customer: Madam yeh kiya open, ab batao isme lead nahi dikh rahi hai, kya karu?
Customer: App open karke upar jo three lines dikh rahi hai upar corner mein dekhiye.
Customer: Hai?
Customer: Upar three lines dikh rahi hai app mein upar dekhiye three line ban ke aa rahi hongi jaha aapka naam likha hua hai.
Customer: Dono taraf ek teen line are yahi teen line kar di.
Customer: Main bol rahi hu jaha pe aapne app open kiya.
Customer: Kar diya aage bolo, aage ha.
Customer: Teen line open kar di maine, kar diya.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says leads sent are old.

- Customer wants leads to be sent on WhatsApp.

- Customer complains about no lead conversion.

- Customer wants to close his account.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to check leads on app.

- Executive offered video call to explain app usage.

- Executive stated leads cannot be shared on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, whatsapp, app, lead conversion
